channel.title: NullPointer error

item.title: NullPointer error
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

mmk so my server only has two nullpointerexceptions that occur. I am trying to fix this oneâ€¦ anyone have a fix?

i know where the problem is i just dont know what to do to fix it.

Heres the code i have at that spot

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1655) { 
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomCrawling_Hand(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18);
}

I asume if i removed the part about drops, it would fix, but i want this monster to have drops so i dont want to do that.

obviously no1 on mopar is good enough to answer this problem -.-
